reviews.text: Yulong Snow Mountain is the southernmost glacier in the northern hemisphere. Its highest peak is named Shanzidou, 5,596 m (18,360 ft) above sea level.  I would highly recommend to prepare your body before climb up to the mountain. I have seen most of the people get the attitude sickness very badly (including myself)

What a beautiful place on the earth, breathtaking views. must visit place if you go to Lijing. Make sure go to entrance before 7am in the morning to buy the tickets if you are travelling holiday season in China, because they are selling only limited amount of tickets or you can go through the travel agents. Bring your own oxygen can before you go there, much cheaper to buy them in the city than in the mountain. Walk slowly in top the mountain.
Beautiful place. Oxygen is thin on the mountain, don’t forget oxygen can before you go. The temperature is freezing.
A nice climb for an afternoon. Breathtaking view.
A breathtaking mountain to sightsee.

I visited in the past - it was great. Now it's closed - gone. RIP

This cosy European-style cafe is in a scenic spot right in the centre of the old town of Lijiang.  It was so comfortable and quiet that we ended up sitting there for over an hour.  The staff speak good English and the coffee is excellent if a little pricey.

Lovely selection for breakfast and very reasonably priced for its location in the old city. Has lunch and dinner options too. For a couple of backpackers like us it was a great find. Nice story behind the place as well (you'll have to open the menu to find out!)
Pretty good breakfast. Asian as well as western food options. Reasonably priced. Good service.
Pleasant place for a quite breakfast or afternoon tea. Warning: not suitable if you are in a hurry.

这里最著名的是三文鱼 
其实这个不是常规的三文鱼 这里的分两种 一种是金鳟 应该就是常规的三文鱼 还有一种叫虹鳟 价格较低 38一斤 我们就点的后面这种 鱼太大了 我们自己吃不完 正好碰见同去雪山的也来吃 就拼了一只鱼 
鱼的价格倒是不贵 但是加上其他的东西价格就有点高了 这里有个三文鱼三吃 生鱼片 炸鱼皮 火锅煮边角料 其中火锅的锅底要收费 生鱼片用的酱油芥末之类的要收费 单是这两个就差不多六七十了。。
火锅煮的鱼没什么特色 生鱼片也是常规的 没吃过的是炸的鱼皮 还可以 推荐一下
